subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ principal owner, George M. Steinbrenner, fell ill during a play in which his granddaughter was performing Sunday afternoon at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and he was briefly hospitalized.
snippet: The Yankees’ principal owner, George M. Steinbrenner, fell ill during a play in which his granddaughter was performing Sunday afternoon at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and he was briefly hospitalized.
